properties.address: Adis Legacy Pre Loved Shop, Lincolnshire LN6 0AZ
properties.description: Adis legacy pre loved shop with a small community room. An affordable shop providing clothes, household item, ornaments, bric a brac. Our local community pop in for a cuppa and some company and so we have decided to extend our service to offer a warm space. We are already welcoming, inclusive, accessible and now we want to offer warmth too! Our volunteers all have the same goal, to make people welcome and feel valued
properties.title: Adis Legacy Pre Loved Shop

properties.address: Birchwood Breakthrough Centre, Lincolnshire LN6 0NA
properties.description: Birchwood Breakthrough Centre is a community hub with a library and community cafe in it. There are several spaces for people to work from and free wifi. Our cafe also serves free tea and coffee all the time.
properties.title: Birchwood Breakthrough Centre

properties.address: Boultham Breakthrough Centre, Lincoln, Lincolnshire LN6 7ST
properties.description: The Breakthrough Centre is a community hub with a library, community cafe and space for people to work on laptops. We have free wifi and our cafe serves free tea and coffee all the time that it is open.
properties.title: Boultham Breakthrough Centre

properties.address: Branston Church Hall, Lincoln, Lincolnshire LN4 1LZ
properties.description: SPACE OPENING ON 15th December 2023** **Open From 15th Dec '23 - Open 1st & 3rd Friday every Month, January, February & March 2024 - 2.00pm-4.00pm** Everyone welcome. A warm welcome and free refreshments are available to anyone in the village. Come along and have a chat, meet new people, play a game, do a puzzle or just sit and relax in a warm friendly space.
properties.title: Branston Community Group - Good Neighbour Scheme

properties.address: Station Road, Branston, Lincoln LN4 1LH
properties.description: We are delighted to offer free hot drinks and a warm space surrounded by books and friendly faces between the hours of 1:30-2:30pm every Saturday.
properties.title: Branston Community Library

properties.address: 12 High Street, Lincoln, Lincoln LN4 1NB
properties.description: Open each Thursday morning from 10.00 am - 12.00 noon and for all age groups. Just pop along for a free hot drink or just a chat **We are a friendly Members Social Club open to all residents.
properties.title: Branston Home Guard Warm Spaces

properties.address: Bridge Central, Lincoln, Lincoln LN5 7NN
properties.description: A 'home from home' space to have a hot drink, toast, soup, enjoy some craft activities, play board games, make new friends
properties.title: Bridge Central Well-being space

properties.address: Bridge Community Hub, Lincoln, Lincolnshire LN5 8NQ
properties.description: A warm library space with comfy sofas, free WiFi, hot drinks and snacks. We also have a food bank on site and a drop-in CAB service on Mondays and Tuesdays. All to the sound of the best folky tunes available.
properties.title: Bridge Community Hub

properties.address: Bridge Community Venue, Lincoln, Lincolnshire LN5 8PY
properties.description: Free hot drinks, snacks, soft play for under 5s, charity shop, clothing bank, clothing library for children. A great place to meet others and stay warm!
properties.title: Bridge Community Venue

properties.address: Sturton by Stow Village Hall, Lincolnshire LN1 2AE
properties.description: Community Winter Warmers running every week through the winter months ahead. Starting this coming Monday 6th November from 1pm-4pm Free to all and everyone is welcome to join us for a warm meal, drink or just a chill, chat and cake.
properties.title: Community warm Space

properties.address: Lincoln Unitarian Chapel, 377 High Street, Lincoln, Lincolnshire LN5 7RY
properties.description: Our focus is combatting loneliness and isolation. All are welcome. You don't have to craft, but we have crafts available or you can bring your own. If you are struggling for hygiene products or your heating, we can arrange for a pack or a blanket during the Hygiene Bank session. Every Wednesday, we hold Cosy Crafters from 11am to 1pm, followed by the Lincoln Hygiene Bank from 1pm to 3pm. Hot drinks and juice available, as well as a variety of biscuits (including Free From) during both sessions.
properties.title: Cosy Crafters, Lincoln Blanket Bank, and Lincoln Hygiene Bank

properties.address: Dunston Methodist Church, Lincoln, Lincolnshire LN4 2ET
properties.description: Second Tuesday every month. An opportunity to get together or enjoy a brew and newspaper/magazine. There'll also be a play area for babies/preschoolers. We offer light breakfasts with toast, jams, teacakes, plus cake and proper coffee, all on a 'pay what you feel' basis, and allergies/food preferences are catered for. We look forward to welcoming you.
properties.title: Dunston Community Cafe

properties.address: Ermine Exchange Wellbeing Hub and Coffee House, Lincoln, Lincolnshire LN2 2DS
properties.description: The Ermine Exchange is a coffee house and Wellbeing Hub in which visitors can enjoy a variety of hot and cold drinks, and cake. Guests can be signposted to access a host of other services and we have a number of care professionals who use the space and third sector service providers.
properties.title: Ermine Exchange Wellbeing Hub

properties.address: 19 Ravendale Drive, Lincoln, Lincolnshire LN2 2bt
properties.description: Library space free to all
properties.title: Ermine library

properties.address: 19 Ravendale Drive, Lincoln, Lincolnshire LN2 2BT
properties.description: We are a library and community hub operated by Bishop Grosseteste University with funding support from the UKSPF. Along with books, computers, Wi-Fi access and other useful resources, we host free and fully-funded activities for a variety of ages.
properties.title: Ermine Library and Community Hub

properties.address: Green Synergy, Lincolnshire LN2 5RD

properties.description: Open to all on Thursdays and Saturdays during library opening times for warmth, company and refreshments Open to all on Wednesday afternoons during term time for warmth, company, refreshments and wellbeing activities at our wellbeing group.

properties.address: Lincoln Central Library, Lincoln, Lincolnshire LN2 1EZ

properties.address: The Salthouse, Free School Lane, Lincoln LN2 1EY
properties.description: On Thursdays we hold the Love Your Neighbour Cafe from 10.30am to 1pm with free drinks & cakes as well as access to table tennis and pool. At lunch we serve delicious baked potatoes for a small donation. Our warm space includes free refreshments, wifi, games & activities.
properties.title: Love Your Neighbour Cafe

properties.address: Nettleham Community Hub, Lincolnshire LN2 2SL
properties.description: Nettleham Community Hub is a registered charity based in the beautiful village of Nettleham. Inside Nettleham Community Hub is our fantastic library, Seven Districts Coffee and seating for everyone, no matter whether you are a library user or a customer of Seven Districts. There is also free wifi and public toilets. While you are visiting, pick up one of our whats on guides for everything we have going on inside the hub.
properties.title: Nettleham Community Hub
